text: Build in: South Australia (change) 1300 786 773 Enquir e House Designs Display Homes House & Land Style Inspiration Build with Metricon M or e HomeThe Metricon Way The Metricon WayMetricon has been building homes in Australia for more than 50 years. Learn what sets us apart from our competitors, and why Metricon has been named Australia's Number One builder seven years in a row* and received the HIA Professional Major Builder Award nine times in South Australia. I'm looking for...Product Review 2025 Award Winner Metricon has proudly been named a 2025 Product Review winner. With thousands of Australians relying on Product Review, this prestigious award recognises Metricon’s commitment to putting customers first so you can be confident wherever you are on life’s journey, we can help you love where you live. The Metricon Difference Our designs, our craftmanship, our people, it’s what sets us apart. Our difference is all part of the Metricon Way, you get every day. The right homes to love where you live. The right people and team to help you every step of the way. The right way, with home guarantees and quality in the things we do so you can build with confidence. Over 50 Years We’ve been helping Australians love where they live for more than 50 years. Whether you’re building your first home or your forever home, we’re with you every step of the way – from the first brick to final handover. Masters ofDesign Our homes are designed to celebrate you. This is why we continually strive to create innovative, award-winning designs that help you make the most of your home and the life you live in it. 6 StageQualityAssurance Our homes may have changed over the years but our commitment to excellence hasn’t. Our rigorous quality assurance process ensures every Metricon home is built to the highest standard. LifetimeStructuralGuarantee* Metricon offers a valuable and reassuring Lifetime Structural Guarantee* on many of our homes. This offers you peace of mind for the length of your ownership of your ownership of your beautiful Metricon home. No wonder Metricon is Australia's most trusted builder. Australia's #1HomeBuilder We believe no one else designs and builds as well as us and, as Australia’s #1 home builder^ for 10 years running, we must be doing something right. That’s why more people choose to build with Metricon, Australia’s most loved home builder.*The Guarantee applies to many of
title: Metricon's Building Excellence and Awards
summary: Metricon has been Australia's top home builder for over 50 years, known for quality, innovative designs, and prestigious awards.

text: builder. Australia's #1HomeBuilder We believe no one else designs and builds as well as us and, as Australia’s #1 home builder^ for 10 years running, we must be doing something right. Explore the Qualia 34 Excellencein aDisplayHome The Kirra in Seaford Heights won ‘Excellence in a Display Home’ in its respective category at the 2022 Master Builders South Australia Building Excellence Awards. Our customers' Denver 42 homeHome is where you love and live There really is no place like home. We realise how precious it is to have a place to call home. Creating the perfect home for you and your family is more than the timber, bricks and nails that hold it all together. A home is where families gather, memories are created and love is shared. This is Metricon’s commitment to all Australians and it will never change – to help you build a home where you can love where you live. Our design approach The belief that Australians should love where they live underpins our design approach. We challenge ourselves to maximise space and inclusions in every home to suit contemporary Australian lifestyles. All our designs focus on value and affordability and reference the latest trends.We value community Our customers are our number one
title: Metricon's Awards and Recognition
summary: Metricon, Australia's top home builder, has received numerous awards and accolades for its professionalism, customer service, and workmanship.

text: The belief that Australians should love where they live underpins our design approach. We challenge ourselves to maximise space and inclusions in every home to suit contemporary Australian lifestyles. All our designs focus on value and affordability and reference the latest trends.We value community Our customers are our number one priority and we know they’re connected to causes and communities that matter to them. This is why we’re proud to be able to give back to charitable organisations such as Canteen and Habitat for Humanity. Learn more about community giving Our people A business is only ever as good as its people. We’ve fostered a team of talented individuals and provided them with the support, training and development they need to best serve you. Our people are personable, friendly, and always have your best interests at heart. Having so many talented Metricon team members around the country, doing what they love, is reflected in our beautiful homes and incredible customer service.Certified Quality Management Metricon proudly holds ISO 9001 certification, an internationally recognised quality management standard. This certification demonstrates our strong commitment to quality across every part of our business, ensuring we deliver well- built homes with care and consistency. Our goal is simple: to give you confidence and peace of mind, so you can love where you live. Where we build Metricon builds homes in four states: Victoria, Queensland, New South Wales and South Australia. Each state has its own head office, a diverse range of displays, and teams familiar with their local environment– whether it’s Brisbane’s hot and humid conditions or Sydney’s sloping blocks. We also service parts of regional Australia and team up with local trades to get amazing results. Find out where we buildLove where you live isan understatement forus. Metricon was withus every step of theway, from the firsttime we walked into adisplay to the day wereceived the keys. — Sabrina and Jarred, South Australia “ ” Start your dream home journey with Metricon today From stunning alfresco designs with open plan living to split level homes, Metricon has an amazing range of new home designs and home & land packages so you can bring your dream home to reality. I'm looking for...Saving for a new home Saving for your dream home can be overwhelming – especially when you have a range of responsibilities, bills, and a life to enjoy. A strict savings plan and a total ban on shopping is going to make you miserable, so we’ve come up with a few ways to save that won’t ruin your lifestyle. Learn to save The First Home Owner Grant Eligible first home owners may be able to benefit from a State Government First Home Owner Grant. This grant varies by state, but no matter where you are is a fantastic incentive to buy or build a brand new home.
